title: ListOfBossInfo
description: Config file for additional boss information

BossInfo.description: Represents a boss whose defeat can be tracked.

Boss.description: The unique identifier for the boss used for merging configs

Name.description: Gets the name of the boss.

WhenTracked.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when the boss has been tracked (but not necessarily killed).

WhenDefeated.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when the boss has been defeated.

Image.description: Gets or sets the path to the image to be displayed on the tracker to represent the boss.

Possibility.description: Represents one possibility of a SchrodingersString.

Weight.description: Gets the weight associated with the item.
